=== Test on Profiles

Test was done with a newly created account that has not been modified in any way. The purpose of this test is making sure everything is working as expected. 

== When creating a Profile

✅ Allows user to insert an image, his username , the region he is from, their playstyle and their bio.

== After creating a Profile

|===
| Issue | Status

| Initial profile picture not available
| ❌

| Does not update or show correct information (Bio, username, playstyle, region)
| ❌

| Contains random achievements that were not assigned
| ❌

| Shows every game as games played
| ❌

| After changing profile picture and information, the profile reverts to its initial dummy state
| ❌
|===

== Summary

Profiles are still on development, only creating a profile works at the moment.
